Header.AddServer: Join an existing server, or create a new one.

Snackbar.AlreadyInServer: You are already in this server
Snackbar.JoinError: You need to add a server code

Snackbar.TooMuchFiles: You can't upload more than {number} files!
Snackbar.WrongFiles: You need to upload correct files!

RecipeDialog.CraftTimeReductionTooltip: {initialValue} with {percent}% reduction due to upgrade module {upgradeModuleName}
RecipeDialog.LaborReductionTooltip: {initialValue} with {percent}% reduction due to skill level {skillLevel}

ReintegratedToolTip.False: Stop deducting this item from the cost price. This will mathematically increase the price of other products.
ReintegratedToolTip.True: Deduct this item from the cost price, to be used when you can reuse this product in the same recipe or in a previous one (Molds, Barrels, ...). This will mathematically decrease the price of other products.

Share.FirstOnlyTooltip: Grant 100% to first product and zero to the rest. Choose this if you consider other products to be garbage.
Share.HonestTooltip: Grant 80% to first product and split the rest equally.

ServerDialog.HaveAnInvitation: Do you already have a server join code?

Confirm.ClearAllMax: Are you sure you want to clear all max prices?
Confirm.ClearAllMin: Are you sure you want to clear all min prices?
Confirm.ServerDeletion: Are you sure you want to delete your server? There won't be no rollback!
Confirm.ServerDissociate: Are you sure you want to dissociate your Eco-Gnome server from your Eco server? There won't be no rollback!
Confirm.UpdateJoinCode: Are you sure you want to refresh your JoinCode? This will disabled any previously generated codes!

ServerManagement.EcoServerIdTooltip: This field will be filled once this server is registered in-game thanks to the EcoGnomeMod.
ServerManagement.JoinCodeTooltip: Give this code to your players so they can join your server.

ServerSettings.Title: Server Settings
ServerSettings.EcoGnomeModExplanation1: Eco Gnome is capable of reading data from your Eco server to accurately calculate the prices of your items. It extracts skills, crafting tables, modules, items, and all recipes. It can read both modified vanilla data and data added by external mods.
ServerSettings.EcoGnomeModExplanation2: To do this, you need to download and install our server mod, [EcoGnomeMod](https://github.com/Eco-Gnome/eco-gnome-mod), on your Eco server. Once your server is restarted, a file named eco_gnome_data.json should be created in the root folder of your game server. You need to retrieve this file and upload it using the button below.

Snackbar.UploadPartiallyNok: Warning: {errorCount} elements have not been imported: {errorNames}. Review your mods and server edits. You can contact Eco Gnome admins for help.

ConfirmServerDeletion.1: Are you sure you want to delete user

ConfirmSuperAdmin.1: Are you sure you want to

SuperAdmin.ConfirmTwiceSuperAdmin: This change has a lot of impact and could corrupt the entire website! Please confirm again.

ConfirmUserDeletion.1: Are you sure you want to delete user

SnackBar.CantDeleteYourself: You can't delete yourself from this page.
SnackBar.SnackbarCantEdit: You can't edit yourself from this page.

SuperAdmin.Title: Super Admin

UserTable.HowMuchIsAdmin: Number of servers the user is admin on
UserTable.Title: Users

UserConfigurationDialog.InGamePseudoTooltip: Automatically filled when completing user registration inside Eco thanks to the EcoGnomeMod.
UserConfigurationDialog.InGameIdTooltip: Automatically filled when completing user registration inside Eco thanks to the EcoGnomeMod.
UserConfigurationDialog.SecretId: Secret Id (used inside Eco for registration)
UserConfigurationDialog.ResetRegistration: Are you sure you want to reset your current registration on this server? You won't be able to use in-game features on this server anymore!
UserConfigurationDialog.PopupConfirmImportBegin: Are you sure you want to import the user with pseudo
UserConfigurationDialog.PopupConfirmImportEnd: ? This will erase your current saved user. Make sure to export the current user if you want to use it later !
UserConfigurationDialog.SnackbarErrorBadFile: Import User Error - Choose a correct file.
UserConfigurationDialog.SnackbarErrorBadUser: Import User Error - Can't find the imported user

PriceCalculator.LoadError: An error occurred during the load. You can try to reset all your data to fix the error.

CostMin.Tooltip: The cost related to this crafting table for each minute of craft. Represent the fuel consumption, parts replacement, eventual crafting fees...

MarginPercent.Tooltip: The margin percent that will be applied on your sale price. Check the 'Margin Calculation Type' tooltip option for calculation details.

NonSkilled.Tooltip: Unlock the list of non-skilled recipes in the recipe selector.

LevelAccessible.Tooltip: Only display recipes that are allowed by your skills levels.

Tooltip.2: MarkUp (default): you sum the CostPrice and Margin*CostPrice/100 to get the SalePrice
Tooltip.3: Gross Margin: The Margin percent is the percent of benefit of your SaleCost, that is capped between -99.99% and 99.99%.

CalorieCost.Tooltip: The cost of the food you eat, for 1000 calories spent in a craft. If you buy only salads that brings 700cal for 5$, then Cost per 1000 calories is 1000 * 5 / 700 = 7,14$

PriceTooltip.isTagEmptyPrice: This value will be the minimum price of it's related items (if all values are defined !), unless you choose a specific one by clicking a star.
PriceTooltip.isAutoCalculatedPrice: This value is automatically calculated by the system. If it's empty, make sure you set the price of all 'Items to buy.'
PriceTooltip.isItemEmptyPrice: Set this price to allow calculation of related recipes
PriceTooltip.isMinPrice: This value is set at the minimum price of the server
PriceTooltip.isMaxPrice: This value is set at the maximum price of the server

PriceCalculator.CancelOverride: Don't override this product price anymore.
PriceCalculator.AddFavoriteItem: Favorite this item, apply its price to the related tag
PriceCalculator.AddOverride: Override this price, considering it's not a product to sell but a product to buy
PriceCalculator.RecipeTooltip: Open recipe popup, it displays details of calculation
PriceCalculator.RecipeTooltipWithShare: Open recipe popup, it gives ability to control the product price repartition and displays details of calculation
PriceCalculator.MarginTooltip: Your Margin configuration does not allow to calculate a Sale Price. Check your Margin Percent and Margin Calculation Type.
PriceCalculator.AddFavoriteRecipe: Favorite this recipe, apply its price to the related product

Snackbar.CantRemoveLastMargin: You can't remove your last margin
